metadata.title: CVE-2020-6542 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in ANGLE in Google Chrome prior to 84.0.4147.125 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
